planStarted.description: Datetime when the user subscribed to the current plan.

priorPlanStarted.description: Datetime when the user subscribed to the prior plan.

planEnded.description: Datetime when the user ended the plan.

taxRate.description: Applicable tax rate for the plan.

planBaseFeesKey.description: Current plan key (as in Stripe product).

planQuota.description: Current plan quota in quantity of units (NB some API use several units per name).

priceUSD.description: Current plan monthly price expressed in USD (includes a free quota).

priceOverageUSD.description: Current plan price for overages expressed in USD (extra price per unit above the free quota).

price.description: Current plan price for overages expressed in Currency (extra price per unit above the free quota).

priceOverage.description: Current plan price for overages expressed in Currency (extra price per unit above the free quota).

currencyFactor.description: For USD, GBP, EUR - the factor is 1.

subscriptionStarted.description: Datetime when the user subscribed to the plan.

periodStarted.description: Datetime when the the plan's current period started.

periodEnded.description: Datetime when the the plan's current period endend.

stripeCurrentPeriodEnd.description: Datetime when the the plan's current period endend (in Stripe). Internal and Stripe periodicity should ~coincide.

stripeCurrentPeriodStart.description: Datetime when the the plan's current period started (in Stripe). Internal and Stripe periodicity should ~coincide.

billingStatus.description: Current period billing status ex OPEN.

usage.description: Current period usage in units (NB some API endpoints use more than one unit).

softLimit.description: Current period soft limit (reaching the limit sends an email notification).

hardLimit.description: Current period hard limit (reaching the limit sends an email notification and blocks the API Key).

overageQuantity.description: Quantity above monthly quota of the current subscritpion, in units.

admin.description: The API Key has admin role.

vetted.description: The API Key is vetted (assumed truthful) for machine learning.

learnable.description: The API Key is learnable (without assuming truthfulness) for machine learning. Set learnable=false for highest privacy (ie. to forget data as it's processed).

anonymized.description: The API Key is anonymized (using SHA-252 digest for logging). Set anonymized=true for highest privacy (ie. to forget data as it's processed).

partner.description: The API Key has partner role.

striped.description: The API Key is associated to a valid Stripe account.

corporate.description: The API Key has role corporate (ex SWIFT payments instead of Stripe payments).

disabled.description: The API Key is temporarily or permanently disabled.

apiService.description: The apiService corresponds to the classifier name.

createdDateTime.description: The create datetime of the counter.

lastFlushedDateTime.description: The flush datetime of the counter.

lastUsedDateTime.description: The last usage datetime of the counter.

additionalProperties.description: Usage of special features, such as Chinese, Japanese.

serviceFeaturesUsage.description: Usage of special features, such as Chinese, Japanese.

timeUnit.description: Time unit is DAY, WEEK or MONTH depending on prior usage

periodStart.description: Start datetime of the reporting period

periodEnd.description: End datetime of the reporting period

totalUsage.description: Total usage in the current period

historyTruncated.description: If the history was truncaded due to data limit

data.description: Data points : usage per DAY, WEEK or MONTH and per apiService

items.description: Data points : usage per DAY, WEEK or MONTH and per apiService
Data points : usage per DAY, WEEK or MONTH and per apiService

serviceName.description: A service name corresponds to classifier name in apiStatus (ex. personalname_gender or personalfullname_gender)

serviceGroup.description: Groups together classifiers providing a similar service (ex. gender groups personalname_gender and personalfullname_gender)

orderOption.description: As defined by X-OPTION-JPNAME-ORDER the order option can be OrderRankFNLN, OrderRankLNFN, OrderScoreSquareFNLN
As defined by X-OPTION-JPNAME-ORDER the order option can be OrderRankFNLN, OrderRankLNFN, OrderScoreSquareFNLN

countryOriginAlt.description: Second best alternative : country of Origin

score.description: Compatibility to NamSor_v1 Origin score value

regionOrigin.description: Most likely region of Origin (based on countryOrigin ISO2 code)

topRegionOrigin.description: Most likely region of Origin (based on countryOrigin ISO2 code)

subRegionOrigin.description: Most likely region of Origin (based on countryOrigin ISO2 code)

score.description: Compatibility to NamSor_v1 Diaspora score value. Higher score is better, but score is not normalized. Use calibratedProbability if available.

lifted.description: Indicates if the output ethnicity is based on machine learning only, or further lifted as a known fact by a country-specific rule. Let us know if you believe ethnicity is incorrect on a specific case where lifted is true.

score.description: Compatibility to NamSor_v1 Diaspora score value. Higher score is better, but score is not normalized. Use calibratedProbability if available.

lifted.description: Indicates if the output ethnicity is based on machine learning only, or further lifted as a known fact by a country-specific rule. Let us know if you believe ethnicity is incorrect on a specific case where lifted is true.

/api2/json/usRaceEthnicity/{firstName}/{.description: a US resident's likely race/ethnicity : W_NL (white, non latino), HL (hispano latino),  A (asian, non latino), B_NL (black, non latino), AI_AN (American Indian or Alaskan Native*) and PI (Pacific Islander*). *optionally
